        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-cbf0afaf-be38-4be3-9402-8d890855f8d5');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-af22a114-d6c8-4093-889a-5d82ba705f0a');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><div data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="videos" class="gui-card card-de-videos " id="card-de-videos-f40b6b37-dca4-427d-97d5-f4d30cc52042"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="card-de-videos-custom"><a class="gui-text-title"

.agrupamento-vertical-simples .glb-hl-style-informe-publicitario .chapeu {
    color: #fff !important;
}

.nano>.pane {
    z-index: 12;
}
</style><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    window.onload= function() {
         if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
     }
})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 26/03/2017 00:20:08 --></html>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var errorName = null;
    function isBrowserSupportPlugin() {
        var supported = null; 
        try {
            new ActiveXObject("");
        }
        catch (e) {
            // FF has ReferenceError here
            errorName = e.name; 
        }     
        try {
            supported = !!new ActiveXObject("htmlfile");
        } catch (e) {
            supported = false;
        }
        if(errorName != 'ReferenceError' && supported==false){
            supported = false;
        }else{
            supported =true;
        }
        return supported;
    }

  function isMetroIE() {
    var matchIE = /MSIE\s([\d.]+)/;
    if ((matchIE.test(navigator.userAgent)) && !isBrowserSupportPlugin())
      return true;
    else 
      return false;
  }
  
  var iRegex = /android|(iP(hone|ad))/i;
  if (iRegex.test(navigator.userAgent) || isMetroIE()){
      var url= "html5.html?page=0";
      if( false &&  window.parent)
         window.parent.location=url;
      else
         window.location =url;
   }
</script>

Ingressos, que custam entre R$ 75 e R$ 330, já estão à venda.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="3"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/apos-aposentadoria-idoso-de-81-anos-conclui-3-curso-superior-na-bahia.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/k-APdbJCRWcxaX5IDlwpNXRQMxM=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/filhas-e-netas.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/UFbGa33gmRNyq6Bgi0nFATEpzUc=/0x0:1700x1065/810x456/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/filhas-e-netas.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/w08l5xMynv6EesPm-Ou0rU1ya1U=/0x0:1700x1065/1080x608/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/filhas-e-netas.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/k-APdbJCRWcxaX5IDlwpNXRQMxM=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/filhas-e-netas.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">EXEMPLO DE VIDA</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 11 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/apos-aposentadoria-idoso-de-81-anos-conclui-3-curso-superior-na-bahia.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Após aposentadoria, idoso de 81 anos conclui terceiro curso superior</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Valter Ferreira mora em Salvador e se formou em Direito na sexta-feira (24).
Aposentado já havia se formado em Turismo e Metodologia de Ensino.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="4"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/em-acidente-carga-de-feijao-cai-sobre-cabine-e-motorista-morre-na-bahia.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/9jSbnpWIPIT2fsRtxguXcPAuGSc=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/acidente_bombeiros.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/n0AyjlG1L98ZY44t1SXyU4_MxGE=/0x0:1700x1065/810x456/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/acidente_bombeiros.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/uSRqjnew1D8TjFJkUkZrv2-ewlU=/0x0:1700x1065/1080x608/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/acidente_bombeiros.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/9jSbnpWIPIT2fsRtxguXcPAuGSc=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/acidente_bombeiros.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">BA-093</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 17 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/em-acidente-carga-de-feijao-cai-sobre-cabine-e-motorista-morre-na-bahia.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Em acidente, carga de feijão cai sobre cabine e caminhoneiro morre</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Caminhão bateu em carro, na noite de quinta-feira (23), na BA-093.
Dois homens que estavam no menor veículo também morreram em colisão.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="5"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/exposicao-gratuita-leva-dragoes-robotizados-shopping-de-salvador.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/7SmBiou-kER2PTkw1fyCRdgTrPU=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/expo_dragoes_5aeqJEr.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/xOLek8X9FOHQDc26M0z61Ef0214=/0x0:1700x1065/810x456/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/expo_dragoes_5aeqJEr.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/zO1MPxlyp6tUmWTxs3SJw1DaiOA=/0x0:1700x1065/1080x608/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/expo_dragoes_5aeqJEr.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/7SmBiou-kER2PTkw1fyCRdgTrPU=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/expo_dragoes_5aeqJEr.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">LAZER</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 12 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/exposicao-gratuita-leva-dragoes-robotizados-shopping-de-salvador.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Exposição gratuita leva dragões robotizados a shopping de Salvador</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Mostra internacional acontece no Shopping Bela Vista até 23 de abril.
Dez espécies de dragões robotizados que se movem integram exposição.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="6"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/jornalista-baiano-lanca-venda-antecipada-de-livro-na-internet.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/nRgGhO0Q5v7-SHOIJtn-JqouG7M=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/ricardo.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/fVl8peO-RW3JU1CkvNZ3tZuuj2A=/0x0:1700x1065/810x456/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/ricardo.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/GJjEaqIeCuSV889S1mMJtMvzbVU=/0x0:1700x1065/1080x608/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/ricardo.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/nRgGhO0Q5v7-SHOIJtn-JqouG7M=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/ricardo.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">literatura</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 14 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/jornalista-baiano-lanca-venda-antecipada-de-livro-na-internet.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Jornalista baiano lança campanha para venda antecipada de livro</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Obra &quot;O curioso destino de Rita Quebra-Cama&quot; reúne sete contos de ficção.
Interessados podem ganhar edições com valores a partir de R$ 20.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">VIOLÊNCIA</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/jovem-e-morto-tiros-durante-festa-gospel-em-itapetinga-na-bahia.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Jovem é morto a tiros durante festa gospel em Itapetinga</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Crime ocorreu em uma praça da cidade, no sudoeste do estado.
Vítima foi surpreendida por homem que chegou ao local em motocicleta.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/inema-aponta-9-praias-improprias-para-banho-no-fim-de-semana-em-salvador.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/kXYNyM-EQZamyGodwNI8e-VbKVU=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/01/01/praia_cIYpIIx.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/4DLtWXEJ4JRo3z_pMNvqLVNRkIc=/0x0:1700x1065/810x456/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/01/01/praia_cIYpIIx.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/sSKdPr4NbdsdIVCXCo7P_0_cDTc=/0x0:1700x1065/1080x608/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/01/01/praia_cIYpIIx.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/kXYNyM-EQZamyGodwNI8e-VbKVU=/0x0:1700x1065/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/01/01/praia_cIYpIIx.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">alerta</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">ontem</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/noticia/2017/03/inema-aponta-9-praias-improprias-para-banho-no-fim-de-semana-em-salvador.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Inema aponta 9 praias impróprias para banho no final de semana</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Entre as que devem ser evitadas estão Porto da Barra, Corsário e Pituba.
Balanço foi divulgado pelo instituto na sexta-feira (24)</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Bahia</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 16 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/bahia/transito/noticia/2017/03/eventos-alteram-trafego-na-cidade-baixa-e-na-pituba-no-domingo.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Eventos alteram tráfego na Cidade Baixa e na Pituba no domingo </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Haverá interdição progressiva em ruas da Cidade Baixa a partir das 7h .
Já na Pituba as alterações acontecem na orla, das 6h às 10h.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="load-more             var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-32e60d07-cdd1-4934-82f4-de7465e833be');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 19:44:49 --></html>

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-f328a2a8-f67a-41b3-b4b7-373f420ee977');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 19:38:39 --></html>
